title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.9 - Overwidth bus special hauling permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.9 - Overwidth bus special hauling permit

State Regulations

Authorization issued by the Thruway Authority permitting
the operation of 102- inch wide buses on the Thruway system for an appropriate
term. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
100.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
